ShaderNodePreset.Description:
This Matchbox shader simulates NES, EGA and Gameboy video out.
Setup:
- Brightness: adjust brightness of the image - NES: apply NES look - EGA: apply EGA colour palette - GAMEBOY: apply a gameboy type colour pallete
Demo clip: http://vimeo.com/95587150
Based on https://www.shadertoy.com/view/MdfXDH Shader developer: Coldberg
